long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple round button in your email that makes you do magical things! Starting with helping you complete sentences of your email.

Step 1: Write a few words on what you want the email to be about and click on the green "C" button to get started.

There is no step 2.

P.S. We do not store any data.
